summary: porting a famous outfit in TES4
descriptionHtml:
** All credits give to the original TES4 mod author NPR (and his open license), I just port it from TES4.

== INFORMATION ==
  This mod now(V1.1) contains two version of the Eisen armor(black and white) and a customized esp file for not overwriting the vanilla ebony armor. Some minor rendering error still present, the problems will be solved once I figure out how the shader setting works in NIF records. 
*UPDATE FROM V1.0: fix the 1st-persion issue of hand display

== HOW TO INSTALL ==
1. just extract the archive to your data folder (for example: D:\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)

2. remember to enable armor_eisen.esp in Skyrim launcher, and then launch the game.

3. in game, type \'~\' for entering the console
type some of follwoing lines for acquiring outfits by your favors

NOTE: XX is usually 02 is you haven\'t installed any other mods yet. If you get nothing by typing like \"player.additem 02000800 1\", try XX = 03, 04.....09, 0a,0b....0f, 10,11.....  until you get the Eisen stuff.

player.additem XX000800 1                            => invisible boots used to hide vanilla feet 
player.additem XX000801 1                            => black cuirass
player.additem XX000802 1                            => gauntlet
player.additem XX000803 1                            => to wear white version cuirass
player.additem XX000804 1                            => white version gauntlets

4. wear these three items, then you will see it.

Original TES4 mod link
http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=36939
author: NPR and invalidfate
